tool_description: subscribe to youtube channels and get their episodes without google
name: Youtube Channels Api
title: Youtube Channels Api

api_list.name: feed#show
api_list.description: shows information about feed and its episodes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-channels-api.p.rapidapi.com/feeds/UCNa8NxMgSm7m4Ii9d4QGk1Q"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-channels-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-channels-api.p.rapidapi.com/feeds/{yt_channel_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-channels-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
